meanings.definition: A period of intense work or study to meet a deadline.
meanings.sent1: During the charette, everyone worked hard to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The students had a charette to complete their assignments before the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The charette turned into a race against the clock as the deadline approached.
meanings.sent4: In the charette, time seemed to speed up, making hours feel like minutes.
meanings.sent5: The charette was a whirlwind of activity, with everyone focused on their tasks.

meanings.sent1: The charette brought together designers to brainstorm ideas for the new building.
meanings.sent2: During the charette, the team worked together to create a beautiful logo.
meanings.sent3: The charette felt like a creative party where ideas flowed freely.
meanings.sent4: In the charette, creativity sparked like fireworks in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The charette was a hive of creativity, with each member contributing unique perspectives.

meanings.sent1: The charette was fierce as teams battled to win the top prize.
meanings.sent2: In the charette, participants showcased their skills in a friendly competition.
meanings.sent3: The charette turned into a fun game where everyone tried their best to win.
meanings.sent4: During the charette, the atmosphere was charged with excitement and anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The charette was a thrilling event, with competitors giving their all to come out on top.
